General.Name: Wilton Resources Inc
General.Description: Wilton Resources Inc. operates as an oil and gas exploration and development company in Canada. It also focuses on acquiring oil and gas properties in the Middle East and Africa. The company was formerly known as Hackamore Capital Corp. and changed its name to Wilton Resources Inc. in October 2008. Wilton Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 1900, 520-3rd Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0R3
